jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
If you are passionate about conceptualising, planning, and building things at scale - we would love to talk to you. As part of the consumer platform group, you will partner with a team of enormously talented engineers, designers and UX researchers to enable solutions for users on the GoJek app, powered by fully reliable infrastructure & tooling. 
Being part of the communication stream you will play a pivotal role in enabling use cases on the Gojek platform while ensuring delightful, non intrusive communication channels for various Gojek user types (consumers, drivers, merchants etc).
Gojek is the largest consumer technology company in Indonesia, the world's 4th largest market by population. With over 25 million downloads, the GOJEK app has become the leading transport, payments, courier, and hyperlocal shopping app in the country. 
Product Management at Gojek will bring you closer to our customers and businesses in Indonesia and beyond, across transport, payments, logistics, food and the retail industry. You’ll become the voice of your customers and partners by focusing on strategy and analytics, and working closely with design, engineering, marketing, and sales teams to define a product vision and a plan to achieve it.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• You will work with different product groups in GoJek to conceptualise, plan and build communication use cases. You will proactively seek product ideas and feedback, do extensive product discovery via research & data analysis. You will also attain internal product-market fit and widespread product adoption among Product teams, and demo them early and often
  • You will be responsible to innovate new communication channels in addition to improving traditional channels like push notifications, emails, sms etc
  • Define and drive a roadmap that breathes life into cutting-edge experimentation and measurement techniques
  • Ship major features and product improvements in a cross-functional team, partnering with engineering, design and other teams
  • Be in the details. Know your team's work in depth - down to API names and contracts
  • Define clear and well-scoped requirements and usability documents that are easily understood by technical and non-technical audiences
  • Managing third-party risk in a changing regulatory environment. Including Communication, Accountability and plan for Contingencies
  • Be the champion of user delight wrt all the communication being sent to a user

• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience
  • Any work with respect to product integrations is a huge plus
  • At least 4+ years of experience working as a product manager on large-scale consumer products
  • Data-Driven First: When making decisions you leverage technical resources and data to support hypotheses. You are skilled at SQL and understand basic statistics, but you also know when to step back from the rabbit hole of ‘too many metrics’
  • Communication: Strong communication skills. You know how to build trust, set goals, and get things done. You aren’t afraid of using whatever channel (face-to-face, email, Whatsapp) is required. You communicate product requirements through your design skills
  • User-Experience: You’ve applied mature design and research expertise in building product features. You get excited about all the  UX focussed pieces of the PM role
  • Independent and curious, you set your own targets, ask for help when you need it and are always looking to learn something new
  • You are a self starter, you love to understand systems inside out, and make it your mission to deliver quality products
  • A “Can-Do” Attitude: A positive attitude and passion for learning in a fast-paced environment. We move fast!
  • Fast & Agile: Ability to excel in a constantly changing and rapidly growing workplace
